root.name: Tayutama: Kiss on My Deity
root.description: Other MediaAn anime TV series is currently being broadcast in Japan, scheduled for 13 episodes. For more information please visit AnimeVice's Tayutama franchise page.System RequirementsOperating System: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista. (A Windows Experience Index score of 3.0 or higherÂ is recommended for Windows Vista.) CPU: For 2000 / XP, a Pentium-compatible CPU at 800MHz or more (Recommended: 1.5GHz Pentium 4 or better). For Vista, Core 2 or better. RAM: 128MB for 2000, 256MB for XP, 1GB for Vista. Recommended for 2000 / XP: 384MB or more. Sound Card: PCM, CD / DA capable Hard Disk Drive Space: 4GB or more free Video Card: 800 x 600 resolution, 16-bit color. Recommended: 32-bit full color. For Vista: 64MB of VRAM, GeForce 5000 series, Radeon 9000 series or higher is recommended. DirectX: Version 8.0a or higher. Patches You can download a patch from the Official Site's support page.
